DOC.brief_summary: Establish non-inferiority immune response evaluate safety tolerability Rabies Japanese Encephalitis ( JE ) vaccine give concomitantly alone accord either 2 schedule preexposure prophylaxis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity 2 Different Vaccination Schedules Rabies Japanese Encephalitis Vaccines Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 18 65 year age ( inclusive ) . 2 . Subjects give write consent . 3 . Individuals good health per investigator judgement . 1 . If female , pregnancy unwillingness practice acceptable contraception . 2 . If female , pregnant breastfeeding positive/indeterminate pregnancy test . 3 . Contraindication precaution Rabies Japanese Encephalitis vaccination . 4 . Unable comprehend follow require study procedure whole period study . 5 . Participating clinical trial 30 day prior first study visit . 6 . History previous rabies/rabies immunoglobulin and/or Japanese Encephalitis immunization . 7 . Receiving plan receive antimalarial medication ( e.g . Mefloquine ) 14 day prior Day 1 vaccination Day 43 . 8 . Received vaccine within 2 week prior enrollment study plan receive vaccine within 4 week study vaccine . 9 . Ever receive blood , blood product and/or plasma derivative parenteral immunoglobulin preparation past 12 week . 10 . Individuals part study personnel close family member conduct study . 11 . Body temperature ≥38 degrees Celsius ( ≥ 100.4° F ) within 3 day intend study vaccination . 12 . Plans travel within next year area Rabies and/or Japanese Encephalitis vaccine may consider offer . This include limited India , Asia , PacificRim , African country .
